metadata.name: Mafia Revenge #1
metadata.description:
🔵Episode#1

⁦◉ Dark Gangster:
⁦Main members of this group:
Darkman_Thomas_Michael_Frank

⁦◉Thomas: He is originally European. His father was killed in this city. He has high shooting skills.

⁦◉Michael: He is originally American. His skill is in making weapons. Michael has produced unique handmade weapons.

⁦◉Frank: He is originally Asian. His skill is in detecting confidential information.
⁦
◉DarkMan: The leader of the dark gangster. All the mafia groups are afraid of Darkman because they have seen all his terrible attacks.

⁦◉Darkman has returned to his hometown after 10 years.
⁦◉This is the entrance to the city.
⁦◉A city whose heart is blackened.
⁦⁦◉ A city where children do not laugh.
◉ A city whose amusement parks are empty.
◉ A city that does not know the meaning of happiness because it has not seen happiness. 
⁦
🔴Darkman wants revenge on those who
 have blackened this city
_______
MP4 format
60 fps 
18 sec 
4000 * 3000 pixels
Softwares: c4d _ Blender _ After Effect_ Photoshop
